resource: 1002686.description=These lights turn on when the “ENGINE START STOP” switch is turned to IGNITION ON mode (vehicles with a Smart Key System) or the engine switch is turned to the “ON” position (vehicles without a Smart Key System) to indicate that a system check is being performed. They will turn off after the engine is started, or after a few seconds. There may be a malfunction in a system if a light does not come on, or if the lights do not turn off. Have the vehicle inspected by your Toyota dealer. 1002686.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002686.derived=false 1002686.vtc=true
